title:pandapaxxy's Season 22 World Drop Breakdown
description:https://www.reddit.com/r/sharditkeepit/comments/16b03ta/season_22_world_drop_breakdown/

// Psi Hermetic V - PvE (mkb,controller,pve)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "Psi Heretic V has some incredible uses in PvE. It's not the absolute strongest weapon, but it will be a reliable workhorse if you need a pulse. Being one from the the highest damage archetype paired with Frenzy, or even Kill Clip you'll be able to have some great damage or stasis utility through Headstone. Outlaw is the best neutrally but Enlightened Action boosting the low handling will feel really nice." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:mkb,controller,pve
dimwishlist:item=358788212&perks=839105230,1087426260,1168162263,4104185692
dimwishlist:item=358788212&perks=839105230,1087426260,1168162263,124408337

// Psi Hermetic V - Controller PvP (controller,pvp)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / Controller): "So Psi Heretic V is a great PvP pulse. Don’t believe me? You can hit 100 stability with Smallbore / Steady Rounds / Void Elemental Capacitor / Stability MW, and you have your fourth column perk to do with as you please. Perpetual Motion for more handling and reload, Headseeker for more forgiving bursts, Kill Clip for a bit of chaining, Headstone for Stasis shenanigans. The world is your oyster. Crack it and find out what you want." Recommended MW: Stability. tags:controller,pvp

// Psi Hermetic V - MnK PvP (mkb,pvp)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB): "So Psi Heretic V is a great PvP pulse. Don’t believe me? You can hit 100 stability with Smallbore / Steady Rounds / Void Elemental Capacitor / Stability MW, and you have your fourth column perk to do with as you please. Perpetual Motion for more handling and reload, Headseeker for more forgiving bursts, Kill Clip for a bit of chaining, Headstone for Stasis shenanigans. The world is your oyster. Crack it and find out what you want." Recommended MW: Range or Handling.|tags:mkb,pvp

// Nox Perennial V - PvE (mkb,controller,pve)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvE / M+KB / Controller): "Nox Perennial V is a great addition to your arsenal. Being able to roll with Envious Assassin and Controlled Burst in the Kinetic Slot is incredible. Lead from Gold if you prefer those builds or even just Collective Action for a neutral damage buff. Nox Perennial V’s greatest strength isn’t in its perk combinations, while they are strong, the biggest strength is in loadout flexibility. You can now use whatever energy weapon you’d like. T-Ghoul, Centrifuse, Sunshot, or any legendary weapon you prefer. You won’t be stuck using kinetic weapons with a great fusion." Recommended MW: Charge Time.|tags:mkb,controller,pve
dimwishlist:item=2767393525&perks=839105230,689005463,968510818,2594592626
dimwishlist:item=2767393525&perks=839105230,689005463,968510818,831391274

// Nox Perennial V - Controller PvP (controller,pvp)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / Controller): "In PvP there’s a similar but not quite the same story. Under Pressure with Kickstart is going to be the main play, but Elemental Capacitor is also great for boosting some lower stats. I wouldn’t take this fusion into PvP unless you know you like High-Impacts but it could serve you well, again, in loadout flexibility." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:controller,pvp
dimwishlist:item=2767393525&perks=839105230,2969185026,2451262963,3511092054
dimwishlist:item=2767393525&perks=839105230,2969185026,2451262963,1754714824

// Nox Perennial V - MnK PvP (mkb,pvp)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / M+KB): "In PvP there’s a similar but not quite the same story. Under Pressure with Kickstart is going to be the main play, but Elemental Capacitor is also great for boosting some lower stats. I wouldn’t take this fusion into PvP unless you know you like High-Impacts but it could serve you well, again, in loadout flexibility." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:mkb,pvp

Cure also works better in PvE compared to PvP. Being able to scorch rooms with Incandescent and get some healing back like Unrelenting makes this a sidearm version of the CALUS-Mini Tool." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:mkb,controller,pve

// Heliocentric QSc - Controller PvP (controller,pvp)
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / Controller): " I don't think the Heliocentric QSc will have as much fun in PvP. Kill Clip is the only solid fourth column perk, and while Rangefinder did get nerfed it will be strong on this sidearm for pushing out the AA, thus extending its feel. You'll still want to push out the range via Hammer-Forged Rifling, Accurized Rounds and a Range MW." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:controller,pvp
